"He was just mean, not all Maximals are like him." Airbomber said to Infect=
ra...
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: ilovealllizards 
  To: nbwrpg=
@egroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, July 07, 2000 5:02 AM
  Subject: Re: Neo Beas=
t Wars


  Wrath: I guess. I haven't looked in a little bit. Who is this? *=
Wrath said pointing at Infectra* Infectra: I'm Infectra. You? *Infectra hel=
d her hand out for a hand shake* *Wrath raised an eye brow* Wrath: I'm Wrat=
h. *Wrath says turning away from Infectra and exiting the base* *Infectra f=
rowns*
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: THECODE 
    To: nbwrpg@=
egroups.com 
    Sent: Friday, July 07, 2000 4:27 AM
    Subject: Re: Neo B=
east Wars


    "Hello, Wrath, nice eather we're having, huh?" Stranato sai=
d, smiling at Wrath, trying to be nice even though he really wanted to insu=
lt him...
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: ilovealllizards 
=
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Friday, July 07, 2000 4:07 AM
   =
   Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


      *Infectra nodded and looked around n=
ot really knowing who to choose*

      *Then Wrath steps out of the CR Cha=
mber and see's The Radicons with Infectra and walks up to them*
        ---=
-- Original Message ----- 
        From: THECODE 
        To: nbwrpg@egroup=
s.com 
        Sent: Friday, July 07, 2000 3:26 AM
        Subject: Re: Neo=
 Beast Wars


        "Whomever seems friendliest." Airbomber replied to In=
fectra...
          ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: ilovealll=
izards 
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Thursday, July 06=
, 2000 9:01 PM
          Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


          Infectra: =
Okay, umm....which one??? *Infectra says to Airbomber*
            ----- Or=
iginal Message ----- 
            From: THECODE 
            To: nbwrpg@egr=
oups.com 
            Sent: Thursday, July 06, 2000 7:56 PM
            Sub=
ject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


            "Well, you shall be amazed at how mu=
ch Liono screwed up the future, but you should go and get aquainted with so=
me of the other bots." Airbomber said to Infectra...
              ----- Or=
iginal Message ----- 
              From: ilovealllizards 
              To=
: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
              Sent: Thursday, July 06, 2000 4:43 PM
 =
             Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


              *Infectra nodded a=
nd looked around* Infectra: What should I expect to happen or find out here=
? *Infectra says to The Radicons*
                ----- Original Message --=
--- 
                From: THECODE 
                To: nbwrpg@egroups.com =

                Sent: Thursday, July 06, 2000 4:49 AM
                Subj=
ect: Re: Neo Beast Wars


                "Give them a chance, I'm sure the=
y'll like you." Airbomber whispered back to Infectra...
                  -=
---- Original Message ----- 
                  From: ilovealllizards 
     =
             To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                  Sent: Thursday, July=
 06, 2000 3:23 AM
                  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


         =
         *Infectra smiles waves to any bots in the Maxi base* Infectra: I d=
on't think they like me. *Infectra whispers to Airbomber*
                 =
   ----- Original Message ----- 
                    From: THECODE 
       =
             To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                    Sent: Wednesday, J=
uly 05, 2000 11:47 PM
                    Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


   =
                 "Sure, we'll tell ya." Airbomber said, making sure nobody =
was aiming their blaster's at Infectra.

                    "Hey, everyone=
! This is Infectra! She's with us!" Airbomber said. Plintissa growled.

   =
                 "These Radicons fired at me, Artist, and Dracona when we t=
ried to help them and ran away! I don't think they could be trusted!" Plint=
issa said.

                    "We have our gestalt form and we're useful =
and powerful." Stranato said. Plintissa walked away angrily...
            =
          ----- Original Message ----- 
                      From: iloveal=
llizards 
                      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                   =
   Sent: Tuesday, July 04, 2000 7:12 PM
                      Subject: Re: =
Neo Beast Wars


                      *Infectra nods and follows the Radic=
ons* Infectra: How can you tell if one is not to be trusted? *Infectra says=
 to the Radicons*
                        ----- Original Message ----- 
   =
                     From: THECODE 
                        To: nbwrpg@egro=
ups.com 
                        Sent: Tuesday, July 04, 2000 5:36 PM
     =
                   Subject: Neo Beast Wars


                        Sinesi=
s and Sinister both kept poking each other, but saying nothing when the oth=
er looked. They both grabbed their swords and were about to stab each other=
, but they put the swords away and did a cheesy hug instead.

             =
           Plintissa and Dracona decided to follow Artist and they walked o=
ff to the Ark. Once there, they entered the base.

                        =
"Hey, have any of you seen a bot come by here just staring?" Plintissa aske=
d. Dracona started to look around in logical places a lunatic might hide.

=
                        Deemos and Inzola got bored of sitting around and d=
rinking tea and they left again.

                        "Who shall we joi=
n with, dear?" Inzola asked.

                        "Whomever wants out a=
ssistance." Deemos replies. They walk on until they see the Alliance base.
=

                        "This one looks good, lets go and ask them if they=
 have any need for us!" Deemos said. Inzola and Deemos walked up to the bas=
e.

                        "Ahem, excuse us, but we're looking to join you=
r fine team, we have been looking for a faction to join, and it appears tha=
t it is you who will obviously win the Neo Beast Wars, so we wish to join y=
ou, what fo we have to do to join?" Deemos asked. (Something reasonable, pl=
ease, no killing a bot things or anything.)

                        Gangon=
 had a nightmare, He was again tied to the magical chair when Sinister and =
Sinesis came up to him. Then BrightBlade did, and then Dracona. They all pu=
lled of their masks and were 2 headed, one head Inzola, and the other head =
Deemos. Gangon screamed and held hbis head in pain. Gangon woke up, and rem=
embered that he couldn't move. He considered that thing about getting a rep=
lacement body, how it would be a good idea just in case he had to get out o=
f this dump, which was probable if he wanted to kill himself. He waited for=
 Plintissa and Dracona to come back.

                        The Radicons =
looked at Infectra.

                        "Now, all you need to do is fo=
llow us, we have set you on friend of the Maximals, I'm sure they won't min=
d, seeing as how you would make a great addition to their group." Airbomber=
 said. They walked inside of the Maximal base, waiting for Infectra to foll=
ow.

                        Artist walked around the war room in circles, =
not quite knowing where he was going.
